code: @Manual{,   title = {noAPI: R Client For Public Norwegian APIs},   author = {Ove Haugland Jakobsen and Aleksander Eilertsen},   year = {2023},   note = {R package version 0.0.0.9000},   url = {https://riksrevisjonen.github.io/noAPI/}, }

what: R Client For Public Norwegian APIs
title: R Client For Public Norwegian APIs
text: goal noAPI …

title: R Client For Public Norwegian APIs
text: can install development version noAPI GitHub :

title: R Client For Public Norwegian APIs
text: basic example shows solve common problem:

what: Query parameters for Find Address — create_params_kv_punktsok
title: Query parameters for Find Address — create_params_kv_punktsok
text: Accepted query parameters Kartverket's endpoint /punktsok.

title: Query parameters for Find Address — create_params_kv_punktsok
code: create_params_kv_punktsok(   lat,   lon,   radius,   crs,   ascii_compatible = TRUE,   size = 1000,   page = 0 )

title: Query parameters for Find Address — create_params_kv_punktsok
text: radius integer value radius query, whole meters. crs integer vector input output coordinate reference system. Default value ETRS89 latitude longitude data (EPSG:4258). ascii_compatible TRUE (default) returned data ASCII compatible. size integer value size page. Defaults 1000. page integer value page query. Defaults 0 (first page).

what: Query parameters for Get Address — create_params_kv_sok
title: Query parameters for Get Address — create_params_kv_sok
text: Accepted query parameters Kartverket's endpoint /sok.

title: Query parameters for Get Address — create_params_kv_sok
code: create_params_kv_sok(   search = NULL,   fuzzy = FALSE,   search_mode = c("AND", "OR"),   object_type = c("Both", "Vegadresse", "Matrikkeladresse"),   mun_code = NULL,   mun_name = NULL,   address_name = NULL,   address_text = NULL,   address_ext_name = NULL,   address_code = NULL,   address_number = NULL,   address_letter = NULL,   cadastral_unit_number = NULL,   property_unit_number = NULL,   leasehold_number = NULL,   sub_code = NULL,   unit_number = NULL,   postal_town = NULL,   postal_code = NULL,   crs = 4258,   ascii_compatible = TRUE,   page = 0,   size = 1000 )

title: Query parameters for Get Address — create_params_kv_sok
text: search Norwegian address. example: 'munkegata 1 trondheim'. fuzzy TRUE fuzzy search provided addresses conducted. compatible use wildcards (*). search_mode Modify search parameter boolean logic. Use select whether search require search parameter found match, whether sufficient hits one parameter. E.g. search = 'munkegata 1 trondheim' & search_mode = '' return everything contains 'munkegata' / number '1' / 'trondheim'. Defaults ''. object_type Specify type address query, either road address ('Vegadresse'), cadastral address ('Matrikkeladresse') . Defaults . mun_code character string Norwegian municipality code. mun_name character string name Norwegian municipality. address_name character string name street, road, path, space area entered cadastre. address_text character string name street, road, path, space area entered cadastre. address_ext_name character string inherited property unit name, name institution building used part official address. address_code integer value uniquely identifies addressable streets, roads, paths, places areas entered cadastre within municipality. address_number integer value representing part address number (house number), e.g. 23. address_letter character string representing part address number (house number), e.g. 'B' 23B. search addresses without letter, include 'letter =' search string without filling value. cadastral_unit_number integer value cadastral unit number property. part cadastral address road addresses introduced, road address's link cadastral unit. property_unit_number integer value property unit number property. part cadastral address road addresses introduced, road address's link cadastral unit. leasehold_number integer value leasehold number property. part cadastral address road addresses introduced, road address's link cadastral unit. sub_code integer value subcode (undernummer) cadastral addresses cadastral, property leasehold number. unit_number integer value unit number (formerly called flat number) apartment multi-dwelling buildings. letter first two numbers indicate floor, last two indicate apartment's number floor, counted left right. example: 'H0102', 'K0101'. postal_town character string name Norwegian postal town (place). postal_code character string Norwegian postal code. crs desired coordinate reference system output. Default value ETRS89 latitude longitude data (EPSG:4258). See details. ascii_compatible TRUE (default) returned data ASCII compatible. page integer value page query. Defaults 0 (first page). size integer value size page. Defaults 1000.

what: Find addresses within a geographical area — find_address_from_point
title: Find addresses within a geographical area — find_address_from_point
text: Search Norwegian addresses within certain radius geographical point.

title: Find addresses within a geographical area — find_address_from_point
code: find_address_from_point(   x,   radius = 50,   crs = 4258,   closest = FALSE,   ...,   raw_response = FALSE )

title: Find addresses within a geographical area — find_address_from_point
text: x vector list latitude longitude coordinates. radius integer value radius query, whole meters. crs integer vector input output coordinate reference system. Default value ETRS89 latitude longitude data (EPSG:4258). closest TRUE address closest geographical point returned. ... Additional arguments passed API call. raw_response TRUE list class noAPI returned, including raw httr2_response.

title: Find addresses within a geographical area — find_address_from_point
text: data.frame list

title: Find addresses within a geographical area — find_address_from_point
text: use cases ETRS89 (EPSG:4258) WSG84 (EPSG:4326) can considered equal, users aware slight shift axes two coordinate systems. high precision needed crs set 4326. Advanced users might want look additional possible parameters. list accepted query parameters see create_params_kv_punktsok() refer API documentation details (Norwegian ). function returns data.frame list default. set raw_response TRUE, raw response API returned instead. Note response returned silently.

title: Find addresses within a geographical area — find_address_from_point
code: # Using a vector df <- find_address_from_point(c(lat = 63.42805, lon = 10.39679))  # Using a list dl <- find_address_from_point(   list(c(lat = 59.91364, lon = 10.7508),        c(lat = 63.42805, lon = 10.39679)))

title: Get address info — get_address_info
text: Search Norwegian addresses Norwegian Mapping Authority's Cadastre Land Registry.

title: Get address info — get_address_info
text: search Norwegian address. example: 'munkegata 1 trondheim'. crs desired coordinate reference system output. Default value ETRS89 latitude longitude data (EPSG:4258). See details. ... Additional arguments passed API call. raw_response TRUE list class noAPI returned, including raw httr2_response.

title: Get address info — get_address_info
text: data.frame list

title: Get address info — get_address_info
text: use cases ETRS89 (EPSG:4258) WSG84 (EPSG:4326) can considered equal, users aware hat slight shift axes two coordinate systems. high precision needed crs set 4326. Many users get using regular search parameter, advanced users might want look wide range possible parameters. list accepted query parameters see create_params_kv_sok() refer API documentation details (Norwegian ). function returns data.frame list default. set raw_response TRUE, raw response API returned instead. Note response returned silently.

title: Get address info — get_address_info
code: # A simple query df <- get_address_info('munkegata 1 trondheim')  # Use the advanced parameters to be more specific df <- get_address_info(address_name = 'Munkegata', address_number = 1,          mun_name = 'Trondheim')  if (FALSE) { # Multiple adresses res <- get_address_info(c('munkegata 1 trondheim', 'tromsø gate'))  # A more advanced query res <- get_address_info(c('munkegata 1 trondheim', 'munkegata 1'),    mun_code = c(NULL, '5001'))  }

title: Get entity — get_entity
text: Fetch information entity Central Coordinating Register Legal Entities (Enhetsregisteret) based entity's name organisation number.

title: Get entity — get_entity
text: entity Norwegian organisation number company name. raw_response TRUE list class noAPI returned, including raw httr2_response.

title: Get entity — get_entity
text: data.frame list

title: Get entity — get_entity
text: function returns data.frame default. set raw_response TRUE, raw response API returned instead. Note response returned silently. See API documentation details (Norwegian ).

title: Get entity — get_entity
code: # Get entity by number df <- get_entity(974760843)  # Get entity by name df <- get_entity('Riksrevisjonen')  # Get multiple entities df <- get_entity(c(974760843, 971524960))

title: Get exchange rate — get_exchange_rate
text: Fetch exchange rates Norges Bank.

title: Get exchange rate — get_exchange_rate
code: get_exchange_rate(   currency,   frequency = c("daily", "monthly", "annual"),   n_obs = 10,   start = NULL,   end = NULL,   raw_response = FALSE )

title: Get exchange rate — get_exchange_rate
text: currency currency fetch data . frequency Frequency data. Can daily, monthly annual. Defaults daily. n_obs number observations fetch. See details. start first date fetch data . end last date fetch data . raw_response TRUE list class noAPI returned, including raw httr2_response.

title: Get exchange rate — get_exchange_rate
text: data.frame list

title: Get exchange rate — get_exchange_rate
text: Currency must formatted three letter ISO 3166 code. list available country codes can found Norges Bank. can fetch observations several currencies passing character vector. want include currencies, can set currency argument . Note number observations limited 20 retrieving currencies. default, 10 latest observations returned. can adjust number observations setting n_obs positive integer. can also fetch exchange rates specific time period setting arguments start end. arguments accept date format %Y-%m-%d (YYYY-MM-DD). function returns data.frame default. set raw_response TRUE, raw response API returned instead. Note response returned silently raw_response set TRUE.

title: Get municipalities — get_municipalities
text: Fetch names keys Norwegian municipalities Central Coordinating Register Legal Entities (Enhetsregisteret).

title: Get municipalities — get_municipalities
text: raw_response TRUE list class noAPI returned, including raw httr2_response.

title: Get municipalities — get_municipalities
text: data.frame list

title: Get municipalities — get_municipalities
text: function returns data.frame default. set raw_response TRUE, raw response API returned instead. Note response returned silently. See API documentation details (Norwegian ).

title: Get roles — get_roles
text: Fetch information entity roles Central Coordinating Register Legal Entities (Enhetsregisteret) based organisation number.

title: Get roles — get_roles
text: entity Norwegian organisation number. raw_response TRUE list class noAPI returned, including raw httr2_response.

title: Get roles — get_roles
text: list

title: Get roles — get_roles
text: function returns list two data frames default, one individual roles one entity based roles.  set raw_response TRUE, raw response API returned instead. Note response returned silently. See API documentation details (Norwegian ).

title: Get roles — get_roles
code: # Get roles for a single entity res <- get_roles(974760843)  # Get roles for a mulitiple enities res <- get_roles(c(974760843, 971524960))

title: noAPI 0.0.0.9000
text: Added NEWS.md file track changes package.
